body.p: To his Excellency the Governor of Kentucky

The undersigned Jurymen who sit upon the trial of Caleb Miller charged with a breach of the Peace would respectfully state upon said trial the said Miller was fined the sum of thirty dollars & costs -- Mr Miller is a poor man & we believe this is a case worth the exercise of the executive clemency & pray that the fine aforesaid be remitted except the costs

Jurymens Names
Nathl Lindsay
B Simpson
Joseph Balets
Wm tingel
G B Tingle
Joshua Miller
George Dandon
Joel Willkite
John Woodsides
The undersigned the acting magistr on the trial aforesaid fully concurs in the statement of the Jury men aforesaid

J S Smith P H C
Jany 16. 1862

Henry J. P.
$30. } Breach
Caleb Miller
Remitted
B. M.
Issd Feby 25th 1862
